title: Replace a word in a champion's quote with "noob".
body:
{{champion:55}}  Better dead than noob.
{{champion:14}} How many noobs must I kill?
{{champion:238}} The unseen noob is the deadliest.

replies.body: {{champion:33}} noob.

{{champion:82}} You only need to click once, NOOB! 

>:v

> [{quoted}](name=Solomon Money,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ap9HzlVe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-15T01:04:48.945+0000)
>
> {{champion:82}} You only need to click once, NOOB!

{{champion:84}} So many noobs. Will Matchmaking ever find balance? Good, now we have those out of the way.

i can milk them for elo
